Message.Title: Enron's Skilling Could Get Early Release From Prison
Message.Msg: Former Enron CEO Jeffrey Skilling, who is serving a 24-year prison term for his role in the energy giant's epic collapse, could get out of prison early under an agreement being discussed by his attorneys and the Justice Department, http://www.cnbc.com/id/100615931

Topic.Title: The Way to Fix the USA

Message.Msg: It may well be impossible for Americans to create a nobility. The best solution is what the American Progressives of old did: Just start copying. I have my doubts this will happen though. If the Obama administration sent his team to Berlin he would quickly discover that Germany has been at war against cultural Marxists for quite some time now. East Germany has been totally purged of their filthy ideology with Teutonic efficiency. This had to be applied against Germans, but nevertheless it was done. If, however, I am wrong and Obama and his team are not cultural Marxists there should be no problem copying.

Topic.Title: The Way to Fix the USA
XOM Upgraded to STRONG BUY (EXCLUSIVE REPORT)
The Way to Fix the USA

Message.Msg: And make sure none of these high net worth individuals are from inheritance and then I'll agree.

I ca't remember when I bought, but XOM was @ $ 59. so I'm happy with appreciation and will accept an ever increasing divvy. Would love to see the NG part start paying out as well. Tough with a glut, but then fleets are bringing Gas powered trucks and vehicles on line and scheduled for more in the years to come. PBR, OXY and CHK are all in my holdings from time to time. added more CHK recently. Energy is not going away.
Just look at the Yahoo chart for Max going back to the 1970s. Nice upward trend, great splits, good Divvies. This is a buy and hold, and add on any dip
